remarks: A statement whose reduct is the reduct of a provable pre-statement is a theorem.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mthmval.r $e |- R = ( mStRed ` T ) $.
mthmval.j $e |- J = ( mPPSt ` T ) $.
mthmval.u $e |- U = ( mThm ` T ) $.
mthmi $p |- ( ( X e. J /\ ( R ` X ) = ( R ` Y ) ) -> Y e. U ) $.
